Desc.entry: Established to restore and reopen the Abbeydale Picture House as a community centre for the performing arts and visual media, and create a unique venue for cinema, theatre, music and contemporary circus for the education and enjoyment of all. A member of the UK Association of Building Preservation Trusts. Solely owned and governed by its trustees and members. The group is committed to ensure that the restoration of the Abbeydale Picture House creates a range of economic, social and cultural benefits for the people of Sheffield and South Yorkshire, and preserves an important part of national heritage. A registered, not-for-profit charity and company limited by guarantee no 4765153.
